metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, The Soundmaker is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: The Soundmaker has sections analyzed in the following keys: E Minor,  and E Dorian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
